name: Priyanka Agarwal

description: Streamlined project management processes by implementing Agile methodologies, resulting in a 25% reduction in time-to-market and a 15% increase in team productivity.
Leveraged Angular 10+ to implement and enhance features, resulting in improved functionality and user experiences.
Seamlessly converted ROR code to Angular 13 for superior results!

Spearheaded bug-fixing initiatives, ensuring application stability, and playing a key role in localization efforts for enhanced global accessibility, reducing customer support issues, and satisfying diverse user needs.
Demonstrated bug resolution expertise, led impactful UI improvements, and collaborated seamlessly for user-friendly enhancements, enhancing overall satisfaction!
Performed thorough testing for web and mobile applications, identified/reporting bugs, and collaborated with senior developers to enhance organizational efficiency!

projects.name: WeStride and WeStride Plus
projects.description: Experienced in translating Figma to React.js and UI Tailwind CSS ROR development, converting old applications to new ones with responsive UI and existing feature enhancements.

projects.name: Transpotation Management System(DTD)
projects.description: Demonstrated bug resolution expertise, led impactful UI improvements, and collaborated seamlessly for user-friendly enhancements, enhancing overall satisfaction!

summary: Software Engineer proficient in Agile, Angular (10+), Reactjs, and efficient bug resolution, dedicated with strong problem-solving and attention to detail. Streamlined project management for a 25% reduction in time-to-market, ensuring top-notch web application delivery.
